title: Coca-Cola Q3 Earnings Show Company Defying Worries Amid Inflation
description: The soft drink giantâ€™s latest quarterly earnings defied worries about consumer cutbacks amid rising inflation and fragile economic growth.
dc:creator: Isabella Simonetti
media:description: Coca-Cola has raised its forecasts for revenue and profit growth this year, and it expects to sustain growth into 2023.
